attributes.title: The Oscars Opposition - #1
attributes.caption: ​Spoiler alert: no one cares who wins The Oscars.
attributes.description: Spoiler alert: no one cares who wins The Oscars. Most people don't even see the majority of the movies nominated. Instead, let's start "Enjoy the Show" off with a tradition that looks to celebrate movies we enjoyed this past year even if they weren't given a golden statue by people in tuxedos on a red carpet. Sit back, relax and enjoy the show.Sponsored by Blue Apron

attributes.title: SPLIT: Shyamalan's Second Coming - #2
attributes.caption: Raise your hand if you never lost faith in Shyamalan? PUT YOUR HANDS DOWN RIGHT NOW! Everyone lost faith after The Last Airbender. EVERYONE!
attributes.description: Raise your hand if you never lost faith in Shyamalan? PUT YOUR HANDS DOWN RIGHT NOW! Everyone lost faith after The Last Airbender. EVERYONE!Sponsored by Blue Apron

attributes.title: LEGION: X-Men Upgraded - #3
attributes.caption: ​Is the best comic book super hero TV series ever made not really a comic book super hero TV series?
attributes.description: Is the best comic book super hero TV series ever made not really a comic book super hero TV series? This episode is sponsored by Dollar Shave Club

attributes.title: LOGAN: The Greatest Western Ever - #4
attributes.caption: We always knew we needed an R-Rated Wolverine film someday. Thank the gods, old and new, that when they finally did it they did it right.
attributes.description: We always knew we needed an R-Rated Wolverine film someday. Thank the gods, old and new, that when they finally did it they did it right. This episode is sponsored by Dollar Shave Club

attributes.title: KING OF THE MONSTERS? - #5
attributes.caption: ​Kong Skull Island is supposed to be the return of the great monster movies. But did they ever leave?
attributes.description: Kong Skull Island is supposed to be the return of the great monster movies. But did they ever leave? Jon, Tyler & Andy debate over the top 10 monster films of all time and reminisce over some of the weirdest monsters ever. This episode is sponsored by Dollar Shave Club

attributes.title: HORROR MOVIES - #6
attributes.caption: ​Blumhouse Productions plants $5 million in the ground, waits a few months until a scary movie like Get Out blooms from the earth and then they pick their tens of millions of dollars in profit.
attributes.description: Blumhouse Productions plants $5 million in the ground, waits a few months until a scary movie like Get Out blooms from the earth and then they pick their tens of millions of dollars in profit. Simple agricultural science. This episode is sponsored by Blue Apron

attributes.title: Why Do Video Game Movies Suck? - #7
attributes.caption: With Assassin's Creed & Warcraft keeping the curse alive that all video game movies have to be bad, will we ever see a good video game movie? Should filmmakers keep trying or let it rest?
attributes.description: With Assassin's Creed & Warcraft keeping the curse alive that all video game movies have to be bad, will we ever see a good video game movie? Should filmmakers keep trying or let it rest?
attributes.display_title: Why Do Video Game Movies Suck? - #7
